author: WIRED Staff
title: We Are in the Midst of This Coronavirus Outbreak—Now What?
description: WIRED editor in chief Nicholas Thompson and senior correspondent Adam Rogers answer reader questions about the scientific and social consequences of the pandemic.
content: Last Friday, more than 720 readers of WIREDs coronavirus newsletter tuned in to a livestream with editor in chief Nicholas Thompson and senior correspondent Adam Rogers. Over the course of an hour, Thompson and Rogers answered questions from readers about the… [+5009 chars]
